metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6426 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The cloudformation-compatible API in OpenStack Orchestration API (Heat) before Havana 2013.2.1 and Icehouse before icehouse-2 does not properly enforce policy rules, which allows local in-instance users to bypass intended access restrictions and (1) create a stack via the CreateStack method or (2) update a stack via the UpdateStack method.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6426` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

heat-api - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
heat-api-cfn - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
heat-api-cloudwatch - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
heat-common - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
heat-engine - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
python-heat - 2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: heat package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2014.1~rc1-0ubuntu1').
